title: VFX in Overwatch
brief_description: A look at the use of VFX in Blizzard Entertainment’s hit videogame Overwatch.

constellations_primary.name: Blizzard, Bowie and the Bonets
constellations_primary.description: Overwatch is the beginning of some surprising connections in this Constellation that explores videogame movies, cartoons, and music docos and shows.

description: In 2016 it seemed like Overwatch went from a game no one had heard of, to a global pop culture phenomenon overnight. Yet it’s success was about more than just the mechanics of an advanced first-person shooter. Light on narrative inside the game, players worldwide became invested in the colourful cast thanks to animated short films released as bonus content. From tragic backstories to star-crossed romances, the game’s developer Blizzard Entertainment made sure their millions of users weren’t just invested in playable avatars, they were invested in characters.
